name: InferiorVenaCavaIVCFilterPlacement
title: Inferior Vena Cava (IVC) Filter Placement
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this Grouped value set is to represent concepts for IVC filter placement.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent IVC filter placement.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
